name: Rolling Domino
description:
You will be saved from pressure by the magical domino effect. Aim at one domino and shot it to strike all down!

Challenge different levels and see what surprise are waiting for you after the dominos fall.

Now get ready and start rolling!

Features:
* Suitable for all ages, practice makes perfect.
* No time limits, enjoy the domino effect.
* Free to play, play it anytime anywhere
